description: This Java class, HelloController, is a REST controller in a Spring Boot application that exposes health and info endpoints for the application.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A REST controller exposing health and info endpoints for the application.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Returns application health status as a map with key 'status'.

methods.name: info
methods.description: Returns basic application information such as name and version.
